author: Helen Regan, Kocha Olarn
title: Chiang Mai: About 100 rescued elephants escape flash floods at popular sanctuary in northern Thailand | CNN
text:
Bangkok CNN ‚Äî Flash floods swept through a popular elephant sanctuary in northern Thailand on Thursday, forcing the evacuation of about 100 elephants and trapping dozens of tourists, amid urgent pleas for help.
Dramatic video and images from the Elephant Nature Park near the city of Chiang Mai showed dozens of elephants wading through belly-deep water to find safety on higher ground.
‚ÄúIt was the biggest evacuation we have ever done to save their lives, the water rose rapidly,‚Äù Saengduean ‚ÄúLek‚Äù Chailert, founder of Elephant Nature Park, told CNN, calling the floods the most severe the park has ever experienced.
Video showed park staff who work with elephants, known as mahouts, shouting, ‚ÄúGo go, keep going‚Äù as they urged the huge pachyderms out of their pens and through the high floodwaters.
While many of the animals found shelter on a nearby mountain overnight Thursday, come morning, Saengduean said the danger was far from over.
‚ÄúThere are some animals we could not evacuate yesterday. Thirteen adult elephants are still trapped in their quarters. They are panicking,‚Äù said Saengduean.
A view of the flooded elephant sanctuary in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Elephant Nature Park Northern Thailand has suffered severe flooding and landslides in recent weeks due to torrential rains brought by Typhoon Yagi, Asia‚Äôs most powerful storm this year, which left dozens dead as it swept across the region in mid-September.
Authorities in Chaing Mai, a popular tourist destination in Thailand, have issued alerts for potential flooding as water levels along the Ping River, which runs through the city, reach dangerous levels.
With extensive flooding around the park and waters still rising, the sanctuary‚Äôs founder said they are facing the unwelcome prospect of having to evacuate the animals a second time.
‚ÄúThe situation is a lot worse than yesterday,‚Äù she said, adding that she has requested urgent help from Thai authorities.
A priority is getting hold of boats so the mahouts can stay with the remaining elephants at the park to keep them calm, she said.
‚ÄúWe urgently need volunteers and animal cages as we must move the animals to the mountains due to the roads being completely cut off in both directions,‚Äù the park said in a post on Facebook.
About 30 foreign volunteers are also trapped at the sanctuary, including five Americans, some of whom have been working at the park for several weeks, Saengduean said.
Elephants are evacuated from a sanctuary in northern Thailand amid heavy flooding. Elephant Nature Park The Elephant Nature Park is an elephant rescue and rehabilitation center in the Chiang Mai countryside that has rescued more than 200 elephants from the tourism and logging industries since its inception in the 1990s. It also runs tours and volunteering programs that allow visitors to observe the animals or help with conservation work.
Many of the elephants are blind or have physical injuries, which have hindered their ability to escape and complicated evacuation efforts.
‚ÄúAmong the evacuated animals, there are many sick elephants, some barely walk. We had to help them to get to the foot of the mountain. We are in desperate need for help,‚Äù Saengduean said.
As well as elephants, the park is home to about 5,000 rescued animals including dogs, cats, horses, pigs and rabbits ‚Äì some of which were evacuated in recent days after authorities issued a flood warning.
Rescue workers evacuate animals to higher ground at Elephant Nature Park after severe flooding caused the nearby river to overflow in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Elephant Nature Park Several villages in Chiang Mai‚Äôs Mae Rim district have been inundated by water from upstream runoffs, local media reported Thursday.
Elephants, Thailand‚Äôs national animal, have seen their wild population decline in recent decades due to threats from tourism, logging, poaching and human encroachment on elephant habitats.
Experts estimate the wild elephant population in Thailand has dwindled to 3,000-4,000, a decline from more than 100,000 at the beginning of the 20th century.

author: Isabela Stanga
title: Alerta vermelho: Inmet indica chuvas extremas e 'grande perigo' no Sudeste
text: O Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia (Inmet) emitiu um alerta vermelho, que indica "grande perigo", para todo o estado do Rio de Janeiro, o sudeste de Minas Gerais, o norte do Esp√≠rito Santo e o leste de S√£o Paulo. Entre sexta-feira (22/3) e domingo (24/3), s√£o esperados temporais para regi√£o, com √≠ndices de chuva superior ou maior que 100 mm/dia e ventos superiores a 100 km/h. De acordo com o Inmet, h√° ainda grande risco de danos em edifica√ß√µes, corte de energia el√©trica, queda de √°rvores, descargas el√©tricas, alagamentos, enxurradas e transtornos no transporte rodovi√°rio. Outras regi√µes do Brasil tamb√©m est√£o sob alerta. Em laranja, que indica "perigo", est√£o parte do Par√° e o noroeste do Maranh√£o, bem como Mato Grosso do Sul, uma parte do sul de Mato Grosso, sul de Goi√°s e de Minas Gerais e o estado de S√£o Paulo. Para essas regi√µes, s√£o esperadas chuvas entre 30 a 100mm/dia e ventos entre 60 a 100 km/h. Em amarelo, que indica "perigo potencial", est√£o o Distrito Federal e os estados do Acre, Rond√¥nia, Mato Grosso, Amazonas, Par√°, Amap√°, Goi√°s, Tocantins, Maranh√£o e Minas Gerais. O aviso alerta para chuva at√© 50mm/dia e ventos de at√© 60km/h. author: Redacci√≥n
title: Casa Aliada Vania en √ÅO: L√≠a Lim√≥n impulsa un refugio para v√≠ctimas de violencia | Radio F√≥rmula
text: Despu√©s de recordar el nombre "Casa Aliada Vania" en memoria de una joven v√≠ctima de feminicidio en 2022, la [ alcaldesa en √Ålvaro Obreg√≥n, L√≠a Lim√≥n ](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/cdmx/2022/12/11/lia-limon-presume-exito-de-programa-contacto-mujer-en-la-alvaro-obregon-742947.html)inform√≥ que hasta el momento, se ha brindado refugio a 25 n√∫cleos familiares, de los cuales 19 fueron atendidos durante el a√±o 2023. En ese mismo periodo, destac√≥ que se logr√≥ la reintegraci√≥n de 5 n√∫cleos en situaci√≥n de violencia, proporcionando apoyo econ√≥mico por tres meses, destinado a la renta y √∫tiles escolares para las mujeres con hijas e hijos. Casa Aliada Vania, modelo de atenci√≥n La alcaldesa subray√≥ que la "Casa Aliada Vania" sigue un modelo de atenci√≥n integral para mujeres v√≠ctimas de violencia de g√©nero en riesgo de feminicidio. Adem√°s, L√≠a Lim√≥n enfatiz√≥ que √Ålvaro Obreg√≥n es la primera alcald√≠a con recursos completamente propios que cuenta con un refugio temporal, gratuito y especializado. Te podr√≠a interesar L√≠a Lim√≥n agradece a Fortaleza IAP La alcaldesa en √ÅO expres√≥ su agradecimiento a la organizaci√≥n Fortaleza IAP por su labor en beneficio de las mujeres v√≠ctimas de violencia y reiter√≥ su compromiso de trabajar para que puedan comenzar de nuevo y reconstruir sus vidas. Finalmente, [L√≠a Lim√≥n](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/cdmx/2023/12/28/lia-limon-en-ao-estamos-comprometidos-en-la-lucha-contra-la-violencia-de-genero-795538.html) insisti√≥ en que la pol√≠tica de g√©nero en la alcald√≠a es integral y circular, resaltando que son una alcald√≠a aliada de las mujeres. Este esfuerzo se suma a otras iniciativas como la Tarjeta Aliada, los Puntos Violeta, la L√≠nea Aliada y Contacto Mujer.

author: Vignesh Karunanidhi
title: 8 Early-Stage Crypto Projects with 100x Potential in 2024 - CaptainAltcoin
text: During the last bull run, many individuals made millions by investing early in projects like Solana ($SOL), Fantom ($FTM), and Polygon ($MATIC), which yielded returns of 1200x, 650x, and 1100x, respectively. During this period, the token may experience local dumps, but it generally exhibits consistent growth. During this stage, you can potentially achieve 100x profits by investing in the right tokens. The key? Getting in early, especially during the ICO phase. Check out [NuggetRush](https://captainaltcoin.com/go/ll_inside/) today! This new memecoin combines play-to-earn gaming with authentic gold mining ventures. [Seize the opportunity](https://captainaltcoin.com/go/ll_inside/) with ongoing presale prices! It features a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) chain using BTC and a native token, with bridges and oracles secured by restaked BTC, enabling yield for BTC holders across networks. 2. It ensures transparent AI governance and secures private data, facilitating the development, creation, and monetization of AI agents on the blockchain. 4. SharpeLabs ($SAI) | AI SharpeLabs is an enterprise-grade non-custodial SuperApp designed for DeFi power users and institutions. It offers advanced yield strategies, optimal trade execution, leverage, auditability, and API integration. 5. Grass ($GRASS) | AI/DePin Grass is an infrastructure project powering AI models. By installing the Grass extension, users can sell their unused internet bandwidth to AI firms, earning a stake in the network and contributing to AI growth. 6. ESE ($ESE) | SocialFi ESE is a next-generation Web3 marketplace that lowers entry costs, accelerates sales, and is accessible to all. It is tailored for digital assets, tokens, and real-world assets (RWAs). 7. 1intro ($INTRO) | DEX/Solana Ecosystem 1intro is leading the Solana finance ecosystem with AI-powered platforms, including 1DEX for trading, 1LBP for fair project launches, and 1DEPLOY for no-code token creation. It aims to enhance user experience and efficiency. 8. Parcl ($PRCL) | RWA Parcl v3 is a real estate synthetics exchange where liquidity providers (LPs) contribute to a single pool, earning fees and sharing in the profits and losses (PnL). Parcl Labs provides market index prices via Pyth oracles. However, it is essential to conduct thorough research and exercise caution when investing in any cryptocurrency project, as the market remains highly volatile and speculative.
